name: hdfs-noha
description: A simple HDFS service without HA (Only one namenode and no Zookeeper) on DC/OS. A typical use case would be to deploy a HDFS cluster just to be able to work with a notebook and Spark
postInstallNotes:
HDFS Non-HA is being installed!

	Documentation: TBD !
postUninstallNotes: DC/OS HDFS Non-HA is being uninstalled.
